text: Paulo Evaristo Arns OFM (; 14 September 1921 – 14 December 2016) was a Brazilian prelate of the Catholic Church. He was a Cardinal and the Archbishop of São Paulo. He was made cardinal by Pope Paul VI. He was the last surviving cardinal elevated by Pope Paul VI. (Though Joseph Ratzinger, Pope Benedict XVI, is still living, he is no longer a member of the College of Cardinals). After a long illness he died in a São Paulo hospital on 14 December 2016, aged 95. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2016 deaths Category:People from São Paulo Category:People from Santa Catarina Category:Brazilian cardinals Category:Brazilian Roman Catholic bishops
